Material used.Material Name: A30P a - synuclein with attached donor (Alexa Fluor 488) and acceptor (Alexa Fluor 594) FRET probes
Material used.Description: Donor (D; Alexa Fluor 488) and acceptor (A; Alexa Fluor 594) FRET probes were attached to A30P a - synuclein through the reaction of maleimide dyes with cysteine residues incorporated by site - directed mutagenesis at positions 7 and 84

Readout description.Conclusion: The A30P mutant shows a different conformational preference compared to WT
Readout description.Molecular Effect: The A30P mutation energetically favors population of the bent helix conformation
Readout description.Result Description: At low SDS concentrations near and below the CMC, the A30P mutant lacks the F - state peak at low E FRET values, indicating a preference for the bent helical I - state. At high SDS concentrations, A30P may adopt more extended structures but they are not preferred.

Material used.Material Name: Wild - type (WT), A30P, A53T, E46K a - synuclein and aSyn 1 - 107 (C - terminal - truncation mutant)
Material used.Description: The experiment used WT, A30P, A53T, E46K a - synuclein and aSyn 1 - 107 (C - terminal - truncation mutant) proteins

Readout description.Conclusion: At 10 mM SDS, A30P had a helicity of about 63%. At 1 mM SDS, its helicity decreased to about 54%
Readout description.Molecular Effect: The A30P mutation affects the helicity of the protein in the presence of SDS
Readout description.Result Description: A30P a - synuclein showed different helicity values compared to other mutants at different SDS concentrations

Readout description.Conclusion: At 10 mM SDS, A53T had a helicity of about 69%. At 1 mM SDS, its helicity increased to about 87%
Readout description.Molecular Effect: The A53T mutation affects the helicity of the protein in the presence of SDS
Readout description.Result Description: A53T a - synuclein showed different helicity values compared to other mutants at different SDS concentrations

Readout description.Conclusion: At 10 mM SDS, E46K had a helicity of about 63%. At 1 mM SDS, its helicity increased to about 80%
Readout description.Molecular Effect: The E46K mutation affects the helicity of the protein in the presence of SDS
Readout description.Result Description: E46K a - synuclein showed different helicity values compared to other mutants at different SDS concentrations

Readout description.Conclusion: At 10 mM SDS, aSyn 1 - 107 had a helicity of about 76%. At 1 mM SDS, its helicity increased to about 93%
Readout description.Molecular Effect: C - terminal truncation affects the helicity of the protein in the presence of SDS
Readout description.Result Description: aSyn 1 - 107 a - synuclein showed different helicity values compared to other mutants at different SDS concentrations

Readout description.Conclusion: At 10 mM SDS, WT had a helicity of about 63%. At 1 mM SDS, its helicity increased to about 77%
Readout description.Result Description: WT a - synuclein showed different helicity values at different SDS concentrations

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: The thermal - denaturation data were analyzed by using a previously described model
